source_sentence: 大方等大集經卷第四十二
translation: Dafangdengdaji jing, vol. 42

source_sentence: 隋天竺三藏那連提耶舍譯
translation: Translated by the Sui Tianzang Tripiṭaka Nālandīyaśas

source_sentence: 日藏分中星宿品第八之二
translation: Eighth and Second Categories of the Constellations in the Sun-Store Section

source_sentence: ◎爾時，殊致阿羅娑仙人告諸天曰：「是佉盧虱吒仙人，於過去世亦造惡業，罪因緣故雖得人身半為驢狀，以有慈力其罪除滅，更得最好端正之身猶如帝釋。」
translation: It was then that the sage Jyotīrasa addressed the gods, "This is the sage Kashgar, who in a past life also did bad actions and, although he attained a body half in the shape of a donkey because of the causes and conditions of his sins, he was freed from those sins by the power of kindness and attained a body that's best and correct like that of Indra."

source_sentence: 告諸龍等：「我以福德諸因緣故如彼仙人，為一切天而作導師。
translation: He told the dragons, "Because of my virtuous causes and conditions, I'm like that sage who serves as a mentor to all the gods.

source_sentence: 今亦如是，能教汝等深實語言。
translation: Now, I'm likewise able to teach you profound and true words.

source_sentence: 諸龍當知！
translation: You should know this, dragons!

source_sentence: 佉盧虱吒似釋身已，是天人眾皆悉歡悅，一心合掌作如是言：『今大聖人為我等說往昔之事，何者星宿行最在前？
translation: After he seemed to release his body, the gods and humans all rejoiced, joined their palms together with one heart, and said, 'Now, the great sage is telling us about the past, which of the constellations was the most preceding in terms of its deeds?'

source_sentence: 食何等食作何事業？
translation: What kind of food do I eat and what kind of activity do I do?

source_sentence: 行於虛空復幾許時？』
translation: How much longer does it go on in space?'

source_sentence: 如是問已，仙人答言：『汝等一切至心聽受，我以慈力還得端正，今復憐愍安隱眾生，說一年內事之終始，令於汝曹如盲得目。
translation: After asking this question, the sage answered, 'All of you listen with utmost attention, and since I have been made correct by the power of kindness, I will now have compassion on sentient beings and calm them down by telling them the beginning and end of the year's events, so that they will be like blind people who have gained their eyes.

source_sentence: 初日星宿乃至月滿，諸星所在皆悉具說，為欲利益諸眾生故，安置昴星在眾星前，汝等諸天以為是不？』
translation: From the first star of the sun to the full moon, I'll explain exactly where the stars are, and I'll place the star Pleiades in front of the stars for the benefit of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 一切天言：『善哉，善哉！
translation: All the gods said, 'Good, good!

source_sentence: 我等經歷星宿，知昴最尊大威德天之外甥也，其有六子運行虛空，是故昴星可為先首。』
translation: We who have experienced the constellations know that the Pleiades is the nephew of the most venerable Mahātejas, and that it has six sons who travel through space; therefore, the Pleiades can be their leader.'

source_sentence: 「佉盧虱吒仙人言：『月合諸星起昴終胃，月行宿訖一月將滿，八月黑初月合在胃，如是次第輪轉不息。
translation: "Sage Kashgar said, 'The moon combines with the stars from the Pleiades up to the stomach, the moon travels through the constellations until the end of the month, the moon combines with the stomach at the beginning of the eighth month after dark, and so on in an endless series of transits.

source_sentence: 我今復說剎那之數，一千六百剎那名一迦羅，六十迦羅名摸呼律多，三十摸呼律多為一日夜。
translation: Now, I'll also explain the number of moments, which is 1,600 moments called one kalā, 60 kalās called mahorattvas, and 30 mahorattvas called one day and night.

source_sentence: 「『胃宿縱惡自在如首羅天，能護四方皆得安隱，汝等天人見彼為惡勿生嫌怪，嚴治刑法乃護眾生。』
translation: "'A god like Śrāvastī who has mastery over the determination of evil in his stomach can protect the four directions and make them comfortable, so don't be offended when you gods see him doing evil and guard sentient beings by severely disciplining the criminal law.'

source_sentence: 一切天言：『如是，如是，如聖人教。
translation: All the gods say, 'So it is, so it is, as the sages teach.

source_sentence: 嚴於法令乃濟眾生。』
translation: Strictly enforce the decree and you'll help sentient beings.'

source_sentence: 『月與胃合，其日病者或輕或重難可療治，其日生者性多瞋憤，獷惡剛毅難可親昵，有大官位能勝眾生。
translation: 'When the moon and stomach are in conjunction, a person who's sick on that day may be mild or serious and difficult to treat, and a person born on that day has an angry, harsh, and resilient nature that's hard to get along with, and has a great official position that's superior to sentient beings.'

source_sentence: 亢虛參胃，此四宿日不得入陣鬪戰，不可遠行，不得剃頭及以治鬢。
translation: These four constellations are not allowed to fight in battle, travel far, shave their heads, or treat their eyebrows.

source_sentence: 畢牛軫星，此三宿日，乃宜鬪戰，及以遠行、剃頭、洗頭。
translation: On these three days, it's appropriate to fight, travel far, shave one's head, and wash one's hair.

source_sentence: 柳張宿日，可得造作一切諸事。
translation: On the day of the star Rājagṛha, it's possible to do all kinds of work.

source_sentence: 昴宿、翼宿、斗宿，此三宿日求財可得，宜服醫藥持戒布施，宜作新衣及造瓔珞。
translation: On the days of the constellations Pleiades, Pleiades, and Dipper, it's possible to seek wealth, and it's advisable to observe medicine, observe precepts, and give alms, make new clothing, and make jewelry.

source_sentence: 嘴宿、角宿、女宿、七星之宿，此四宿日宜於行來道路安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Mouth, Horn, and Maiden, which are the seven constellations, it's good to travel on the road to safety.

source_sentence: 氐宿、井宿、危宿，此三宿日作惡得成。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Kuśinagara, Jisu, and Jeta, it's good to do evil deeds.

source_sentence: 房宿、柳宿、心宿、婁宿、七星之宿、張宿，此六宿日得造輿、車床及繩床、并諸衣服，要結知識。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Room, Willow, Heart, Lou, the constellation of the seven stars, and Zhang, these six constellations allow the construction of a mooch, a chariot bed, a rope bed, and other clothing, as well as the formation of an important friend.

source_sentence: 「『昴宿速疾作種種業，其速如火，其日得病酪飯祭之四日除愈，其日生者常得大富，其日入胎。
translation: "'The Pleiades quickly creates various kinds of karma as quickly as fire, gets sick on that day, sacrifices cheese and rice to cure it in four days, always makes the person born on that day very wealthy, and enters the womb on that day.'

source_sentence: 斗宿、房宿、虛宿、柳宿、室宿，此五宿日不宜造作一切諸事，唯得共於大敵鬪戰。
translation: The constellations Diu, Fang, Xuxu, Liu, and Sui are five constellations that shouldn't do anything on their days but fight with great enemies.

source_sentence: 井氐翼宿，此三宿日善惡之事皆悉得作。
translation: On the day of the constellation of Jing, Dao, and Pai, these three constellations are capable of doing both good and bad deeds.

source_sentence: 畢宿之日亦得自在。
translation: They also attain mastery on the day of the constellation Pi.

source_sentence: 井氐危宿，此三宿日，昴宿生者於此日內，不得作事遠行鬪擊，假令急事亦不得作。
translation: Jing and Jiang, on the days of these three constellations, those born in the Pleiades mustn't engage in fights far away from home or, even if it's urgent, mustn't do so.

source_sentence: 女角嘴宿此三宿日亦為最惡，翼宿之日與怨家鬪獲得其勝，或剛或柔還致和合。
translation: These three constellations are also the worst on the day of the Mucilinda constellation, but on the day of the Vipa constellation, a fight with an enemy is won, and either rigidity or gentleness returns to harmony.

source_sentence: 軫宿、牛宿，此二宿日求伴不得，服藥合藥出家布施，造新衣服瓔珞床鋪，臥具等物皆得成就。
translation: On the day of the inconceivable constellations of Aṣāḍhā and Niu, they seek companionship but aren't allowed to take medicine, combine medicine with renunciant generosity, and make new clothes, jewelry, beds, bedding, and other things that will be accomplished.

source_sentence: 參宿、虛宿、亢宿，此三宿日行來安隱。
translation: These three constellations, namely, the constellation of Samsuk, Xuxu, and Kau, travel peacefully on their days.

source_sentence: 鬼尾室宿，此三宿日，共他造惡離於慈心種種得作。
translation: On the day of the night of the demon's tail, these three constellations work together to create evil in others, and they're able to do so in various ways apart from being compassionate.

source_sentence: 七星宿、日心宿、房宿、柳宿、辟宿，此五宿日宜結婚姻，宜造輿車及以床縟，參宿之日作事亦吉，然於一切須生怜愍。
translation: On the days of the seven constellations, Śrīvastī, Śubha, Willow, and Pārśva, these five constellations are good for marriages, building carts and carts, and doing good deeds on the day of the participation constellation, but they all require compassion.

source_sentence: 「『畢星水性，汝等於此第二宿日，造柔軟事悉得和合，其日病者以香祭火五日後愈，其日生者其人大富福德樂法。
translation: "'Watery is the star Pisces, on this second constellation day, all of you will create a combination of tender and gentle works; those who are ill on that day will be healed after five days of worship with incense and fire; and those born on that day will be greatly prosperous and happy.'

source_sentence: 牛宿、奎宿、七星宿日，及心宿日而受胎者，其人薄德常作下事。
translation: When a person is conceived on the day of the Ox, Kui, or the seven constellations, or on the day of the Heart constellation, his virtue is weak and he often does bad things.

source_sentence: 鬼尾室宿，此三宿日，一切事業皆不得作，不得鬪戰不得遠行不得詣官，賣買交易工巧作務皆不得作。
translation: On the day of the Ghost-tailed Constellation and the Room Constellation, he won't be able to do any work, won't fight, won't travel, won't go to an official, and won't be able to do any work in the fields of selling or trading.

source_sentence: 亢宿、虛宿此二宿日，若作好事不得和合，唯宜鬪戰剋獲勝捷。
translation: On the days of the constellations Kau and Xuxu, good deeds won't be combined, and only fights and battles are advisable to win success.

source_sentence: 軫宿之日為事有利，利作柔軟無有障礙。
translation: The day of the inconceivable constellation is favorable and conducive to working softly and without obstruction.

source_sentence: 嘴宿、角宿、女宿等日眾事和合，所作成辦服藥得力。
translation: On the days of the constellations Mouth, Horn, and Woman, various deeds are in harmony, and what's accomplished is effective in administering medicine.

source_sentence: 若欲捨施，若造衣服及以瓔珞皆悉得作。
translation: If you want to give alms, make clothing, or put on jewelry, you'll be able to do so.

source_sentence: 井宿、氐宿、危宿等日，遠行安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Jing, Dao, and Jue, they travel far and wide in comfort.

source_sentence: 房宿、柳宿、辟宿等日，欲離慈心造惡得成。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Room, Willow, and Pārśva, a desire to part with kindness and create evil will be accomplished.

source_sentence: 斗宿、箕宿、婁宿、胃宿、室宿、翼宿此六宿日，宜結親友婚聚知識，床鋪輦輿皆悉得造。
translation: On the six constellations of Diu, He, Lou, Stomach, Room, and Wing, it's appropriate to bring together friends, wives, and acquaintances, and to build a bed and a moor.

source_sentence: 「『嘴宿四日用事，於此世間作諸事業疾速自成，其日病者豆糜祭月八日除愈。
translation: "'On the fourth day of the month of the mouth constellation, they'll perform tasks in the world that are quickly accomplished, and a sick person on that day will be healed by the eighth day of the month of the bean curd offering.

source_sentence: 其日生者為人猛健大富饒財，當為婦女見諸惡事宜自防護，我說不虛。
translation: Those born on that day will be vigorous and powerful, very wealthy, and will guard themselves against bad things for women, and my words aren't false.

source_sentence: 嘴宿生人，若以女宿、婁宿、斗宿、張宿等日而入胎者為惡不善。
translation: If a woman is born on the day of the constellation of Mouth, Lou, Dou, or Zhang, it's bad and unwholesome to enter the womb.

source_sentence: 昴宿、房宿、柳宿此三宿日，不得鬪戰不得遠行及向官府，有須行者應止勿去。
translation: On these three constellations, Pleiades, Fang, and Liu, you mustn't fight or go far from home or the government, and if you need to go, you must stop and don't go.

source_sentence: 井宿、氐宿、危宿等日，造作眾惡不相和順，妄言諂曲欲殺怨家皆得成就。
translation: On the days of the constellations Jing, Lu and Jixing, they create numerous evils that are not mutually beneficial and accomplish the falsehood of flattery and the desire to kill enemies.

source_sentence: 角宿之日欲作事者剛柔並得，參宿之日作事利益能致自在。
translation: On the day of the horns, those who want to do work will attain both rigidity and gentleness, and on the day of the conjunction constellation, they'll be able to do work for their own benefit.

source_sentence: 亢虛二宿不相和合，參宿之日乃得利益，其日服藥出家布施，瓔珞衣服並皆得作。
translation: When the two constellations of Kōshū and Hōshū aren't in harmony, the day of the conjunction constellation obtains benefits, and on that day he takes medicine, leaves home, and gives alms, and he obtains the production of jewelry and clothing.

source_sentence: 鬼宿、尾宿、室宿等日遠行安隱。
translation: On the day of the Ghost, Tail, and Room constellations, they travel far and wide to be at ease.

source_sentence: 心宿、奎宿、七星宿日，此三宿日欲作惡者惡事得成。
translation: On the days of the Heart constellation, the Kuśinagara constellation, and the seven constellations, those who want to do evil on these three constellations will be able to accomplish evil deeds.

source_sentence: 軫宿、胃宿、畢宿、牛宿、箕宿等日，宜結親友得好知識婚嫁吉事，輿車床縟皆悉得造。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Aṣāḍhā, Gṛdhrakūṭa, Pīrṣu, Niu, and Pi, it's good to meet friends and relatives, obtain good friends for marriage, and build carts and red tape.

source_sentence: 「『參宿五日用事能成諸惡，欲為業者少於利益，其日病者以生蘇糜祭於四道十日得愈；其日生人性雖聰明而心懷惡，求於錢財遂至於死，亦主作賊致失身命；其日生人及入胎者，虛宿、心宿、奎宿、翼宿、斗宿、胃宿，此六宿日多為障礙，乃至鬼尾室宿等日，亦不和合，一切諸事皆不得作。
translation: "On that day, a person who's born on a day when his nature is intelligent but his mind is evil, he seeks money and possessions and ends up dead, and he also becomes a thief and loses his life; on that day, a person who's born or enters a mother's womb is obstructed by the six constellations of Xuxu, Xuesu, Kui, Yixu, Dou, and Gastru, and the days of the ghost's tail and other constellations are not compatible, so he can't do anything.

source_sentence: 亢宿之日欲造作者，宜為輕事。
translation: On the day of the hyper constellation, it's better to do light work if you want to do it.

source_sentence: 氐宿、危宿、井宿、奎宿，此四宿日乃得自在。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Dīpa, Kāśyapa, Jīvaka, and Kui, these four constellations will attain freedom.

source_sentence: 「『井宿六日用事，其為惡業分判果決，其日得病炒粳穀華祭於日天，八日得愈。
translation: "'On the sixth day of the star of the well, his bad actions are judged to be decisive, and on that day he gets sick and sacrifices millet and grain to the sun and gods, and he's cured on the eighth day.

source_sentence: 其日生人及受胎者，宜為田作當得大富，又饒畜生象馬羊等，於辟宿日百事不宜。
translation: On that day, newborns and those who are pregnant are encouraged to work in the fields and become very wealthy, and animals such as elephants, horses, and sheep are made unsuitable on the day of the Pārśva constellation.

source_sentence: 柳宿、房宿，此二宿日造作百事多有耗散。
translation: On the days of the constellations Willow and Fang, these two constellations cause much dissipation in a hundred undertakings.

source_sentence: 氐宿之日宜作眾事，如意自在。
translation: On the day of the Śākyas constellation, it's appropriate to perform a variety of tasks as one wishes.

source_sentence: 鬼宿、參宿、尾宿等日，宜造百事所求稱意。
translation: On the days of the Ghost, Samsuk, and Vaiśravaṇa constellations, it's appropriate to perform a variety of tasks to suit your intentions.

source_sentence: 心宿、星宿、奎宿等日，宜出遠行，道路安隱所向和合。
translation: On the days of the Heart constellation, the Star constellation, and the Kui constellation, it's appropriate to travel far and make the roads peaceful and harmonious.

source_sentence: 斗宿、翼宿、奎宿等日，宜結朋友求善知識。
translation: On the days of Diux, Yixing, and Kui, it's good to make friends and seek good friends.

source_sentence: 亢宿、畢宿、觜宿、虛宿，此四宿日為井生人作諸障礙。
translation: On the days of Kōshū, Pisū, Kara, and Hosshū, these four constellations create obstacles for people who live in wells.

source_sentence: 「『鬼宿七日用事，能為柔軟不破善法，其日得病以黃石蜜祭於歲星五日除愈。
translation: "'The seventh day of the constellation Ghost works to be gentle and doesn't refute good qualities, and when he gets sick on that day, he sacrifices yellowstone and honey to the star of the year for five days to get rid of it.

source_sentence: 其日生者此人持戒好樂善事，得大官位國師宰輔，常教國王善法治世，至於娶妻特難和合，慇懃因人然後成就。
translation: This person observes precepts, takes delight in good works, attains a high official position as a state minister, and always teaches the king to govern the world well; he marries a wife who's especially difficult to reconcile and works hard for others to succeed.

source_sentence: 其日生人，欲在室宿、鬼宿、翼宿、婁宿、斗宿等日受胎者吉。
translation: If a person is born on that day and wants to be conceived on a day like the day of the chamber, the night, the night of the ghost, the night of the wing, the night of the lou, or the night of the dipper, that person is lucky.

source_sentence: 畢角女宿，此三宿日為其障礙。
translation: The day of the female constellation Piṅgala, these three constellations are an obstruction.

source_sentence: 七星心宿奎宿之日，作事不成當失財物。
translation: On the day of the seven constellations of the Heart constellation and the Constellation of Kui, he'll lose his possessions if he doesn't succeed in his endeavors.

source_sentence: 尾宿之日作事得成，房宿之日亦多利益。
translation: On the day of the Constellation of the Tail, he'll succeed in his endeavors, and on the day of the Constellation of the Room, he'll have much benefit.

source_sentence: 辟宿柳宿，此二宿日為事不稱。
translation: On the day of the constellation Prabhūtaratna and Ryu, these two constellations are inappropriate for their deeds.

source_sentence: 張宿之日，遠行安隱。
translation: On the day of the constellation Zhang, he travels far and is at ease.

source_sentence: 婁宿箕宿，為其障礙。
translation: The night of Lusu and the night of Susa is an obstruction.

source_sentence: 軫牛昴宿，此三宿日作事和合必得良伴。
translation: On the day of the Pleiades (the Ox), these three constellations work in harmony to obtain good company.

source_sentence: 亢宿、觜宿、參宿、虛宿，宜結朋友及善知識。
translation: The constellations Kauśāmbī, Karaṇḍa, Samantabhadra, and Xuxu are good for making friends and good associates.

source_sentence: 亢宿、危宿，此二宿日所求者得多有利益。
translation: On the days of Kauśāmbī and Kauśāmbī, these two constellations will be of great benefit to those who seek them.

source_sentence: 「『柳宿八日用事，一切惡業皆悉能作，於世間中如閻羅王，其日病者不可療治；其日生者性多瞋怒無有慈悲，多造愆過人所憎嫉，能破善法常好獵射。
translation: "'The eight day star of Willow constellation is used for all kinds of bad actions, and it's like Yama in the world; its daytime sickness is untreatable; its birthdays are characterized by anger and lack of compassion, many transgressions and errors that are detested by people, and it's capable of destroying good qualities and always enjoys hunting and shooting.'

source_sentence: 辟宿、牛宿，此二宿日入胎者吉。
translation: The constellations Pārśva and Niu are auspicious for those who enter the womb on these two constellations.

source_sentence: 軫宿、昴宿，入胎者凶。
translation: The constellations Aṣāḍhā and Pāli, which enter the womb, are bad.

source_sentence: 觜宿、虛宿、亢宿、張宿，此四宿日不宜作事多有耗散。
translation: Sukhāvatī, Xuxu, Kauśu and Zhang, these four constellations are unsuitable for work on days when there's much dissipation.

source_sentence: 箕宿、婁宿房宿等日，宜作眾事得好成就。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Ki and Loh, it's appropriate to perform a variety of tasks that will lead to good success.

source_sentence: 心宿之日，七星宿日，胃宿之日，遠行安隱。
translation: The days of the Heart constellation, the seven constellations, and the Stomach constellation are good days for traveling far and wide.

source_sentence: 翼宿、斗宿、女宿等日，宜修讀學伎藝成就。
translation: On the days of the Constellation of the Wing, Constellation of the Dipper, and Constellation of the Maiden, it's appropriate to train in the arts and accomplish success.

source_sentence: 角宿、斗宿、危宿、尾宿、畢宿，此五宿日宜結知識。
translation: The days of the constellations Horns, Dipper, Peril, Vulture, and Pisces are good for forming friends.

source_sentence: 氐宿、參宿、井宿、室宿，此四日，亦復宜結諸知識。
translation: The four constellations of Kuśinagara, Samsara, Jingsun, and Sukhāvatī are also good days for forming friends.

source_sentence: 「『七星九日用事，於諸眾生溫和柔軟，其日病者以胡麻油和粳米飯祭其先人，八日除愈；其日生者聰明福德常為善事，然彼人性微好妄言，若護其身宜慎妄語，其人作事利。
translation: "'When the seven stars work on the ninth day, they're gentle and tender toward sentient beings; when they're ill on that day, they offer oil of flax and rice to their ancestors, and they're healed on the eighth day; when they're born on that day, they're wise and virtuous and always do good works, but their nature is weak and they like to speak falsely; if they protect themselves, they should be careful about speaking falsely, and their actions will be beneficial.'

source_sentence: 心宿、日奎宿、氐宿，此三宿日受胎者貧乏少財物。
translation: The Heart constellation, the Sun constellation, and the River constellation are three constellations on which a person is born who's poor and lacks possessions.

source_sentence: 參宿、危宿、畢宿等，日受胎者凶常作惡事。
translation: These three constellations, namely, the constellation of Samantan, Constellation of Danger, and Constellation of Pi, are bad and often do bad things.

source_sentence: 角宿、女宿，此二宿日受胎亦貧，好為惡事。
translation: These two constellations, the Constellation of Horns and the Constellation of Maiden, are also poor when they're wombed on a day, and they tend to do bad things.

source_sentence: 翼胃斗宿，此三宿日而受胎者，作事自在得他人物。
translation: These three constellations are born on a day when the constellation Pisces, Stomach, and Dipper are in the womb, and they work freely to obtain other people's possessions.

source_sentence: 婁宿、張宿、箕宿等日，欲作事者多饒障礙。
translation: On the days of the constellations Lou, Zhang, and Xi, those who want to work are often handicapped.

source_sentence: 軫宿、牛宿、昴宿、氐宿，此四宿日行來安隱作事和合。
translation: On the days of Aṣāḍhā, Niu, Pleiades, and Kuśinagara, these four constellations come into existence to work in harmony with each other in a peaceful way.

source_sentence: 虛宿、觜宿，此二宿日為其障礙。
translation: These two constellations, Āśvakarṇa and Śrī, are an obstruction on their days.

source_sentence: 「『張宿十日用事，作柔軟事安隱世間，其日病者以頻婆果生蘇祭神，七日得差。
translation: "'On the tenth day of the constellation Zhang, he does tender deeds and secludes himself from the world; on that day, a sick person offers a sacrifice of fruit from the river to the gods, and he's freed for seven days.

source_sentence: 其日生者性樂芳香衣裳瓔珞，貪於欲事而復嗜酒，若在眾中須自慎儆。
translation: Those born on that day have a disposition to wear fragrant clothing and jewelry, and they crave sensual pleasures and are addicted to alcohol; they must be cautious if they're among people.

source_sentence: 婁宿、井宿，此二宿日受胎最惡。
translation: Rucika and Vipa, these two constellations are the most unpleasant for a day of birth.

source_sentence: 虛亢、觜宿，是三宿日受胎亦惡不宜作事。
translation: Śukra and Kui, the three constellations whose days are devoted to the womb, are also bad and shouldn't be worked on.

source_sentence: 昴軫、牛宿，此三宿日亦多障礙。
translation: These three constellations, Pleiades and Ox, are also very obstructive on their days.

source_sentence: 張宿之日乃得自在。
translation: It's only on the day of the open constellation that they attain freedom.

source_sentence: 胃宿斗宿，此二宿日有所求者不得如意。
translation: On the day of the Stomach constellation and the Dipper constellation, those two constellations obtain what they seek but don't get what they want.

source_sentence: 氐宿之日，其受胎者能除障礙。
translation: On the day of the star constellation Śāriputra, those who are pregnant can remove the obstructions.

source_sentence: 亢宿、參宿、畢宿、女宿，此四宿日遠行安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Kau, Sen, Pis, and Nyi, these four constellations travel far and wide to be at ease.

source_sentence: 柳宿、奎宿、鬼宿、心宿、房宿、辟宿，此六宿日欲結知識障礙不成。
translation: On the days of the constellations Willow, Kui, Ghost, Mind, Room, and Poo, these six constellations fail to form an intellectual obstruction.

source_sentence: 「『翼宿十一日用事，行四天下作兩種業，所謂諂曲及柔軟事，其日得病煮黑青豆，以用祭神十日除愈；其日生者宜於種種，然性愚癡，慳貪鄙悋不能喜捨，亦能不食，五日六日乃至七日，不為世人之所愛樂，善須謹慎防護怨家不宜鬪諍。
translation: "On the day of the wing constellation, he performs actions on the four heavens, creating two kinds of deeds, which are called flattery and softness. On that day, he gets sick and boils black and green soybeans to offer to the gods, and on the tenth day he's cured; on that day, he's born on a day when various things are appropriate, but he's foolish by nature, stingy and greedy, and unable to enjoy equanimity.

source_sentence: 胃宿之日而入胎者，多造諸惡。
translation: A person who enters the womb on the day of the stomach constellation will often do evil.

source_sentence: 危宿、參宿、氐宿、房宿，此四宿日善惡二事並皆得作。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Peril, Sam, Dao, and Fang, both good and bad deeds can be done.

source_sentence: 房宿之日，無有善惡。
translation: On the day of the constellation of the room, there's no good or evil.

source_sentence: 辟宿、鬼宿，此二宿日有受胎者好失財物。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Pārśva and Pārśva, there are people who are pregnant and lose their possessions.

source_sentence: 胃宿、婁宿、斗宿，此三宿日受胎之者，軫牛、昴宿，此三宿日作事和合。
translation: On the days of the constellations Gastrus, Lupus, and Dipper, there are those who are pregnant, and on the days of the Ox and Pleiades, there are those who perform deeds of unity.

source_sentence: 若於虛宿、觜宿、亢宿，此三宿日作事者成，得三宿力遠行安隱。
translation: If these three constellations of Āśvakarṇa, Kālarṇa, and Kauśāmbī are engaged in daily activities, they'll attain the power of the three constellations to travel far and wide in comfort.

source_sentence: 井室、尾宿，此三宿日無善無惡。
translation: Inu and Vipa, these three constellations are neither good nor bad on their days.

source_sentence: 婁宿、七星奎宿、柳宿、心宿等日，結善知識嫁娶之事皆得和合。
translation: On the days of Loh, the seven stars of Kui, Liu, and Xin, good associates and marriages will be consummated.

source_sentence: 「『軫宿十二日用事，為惡自在速疾如風，其日得病以酪祭神五日除愈；其日生者大富饒財，能用五兵、刀槊、弓箭、鬪輪、鞙索，能作大賊殺害眾生。
translation: "On that day, a person born on that day becomes very wealthy and prosperous and is capable of using five weapons, swords, lances, bows and arrows, fights, wheels, and fine cords, and can become a great thief and kill sentient beings.

source_sentence: 若修善者亦能持戒喜捨布施，種種功德皆悉能作，其人行處，七步之內蛇不敢前。
translation: If someone cultivates goodness, they're also able to observe precepts, rejoice in charity, and perform all kinds of meritorious acts.

source_sentence: 其日入胎於諸賊眾而得為主，又能持戒喜捨布施。
translation: On that day, he enters the womb and becomes the master of a multitude of thieves, and he's able to observe precepts, rejoice in generosity, and abandon others.

source_sentence: 尾宿之日其受胎者所在之處無有障礙，入陣鬪戰能勝怨敵。
translation: On the day he goes into the womb, there's no obstruction where he's born, and he's able to overcome enemies when he enters battle.

source_sentence: 井宿、室宿，二宿之日，其受胎者從生至死常宜作事。
translation: On the days of the constellations Well and Room, it's always appropriate for the recipient of the womb to work from birth to death.

source_sentence: 牛亢虛宿，此三宿日其受胎者，唯除牛宿不宜作事。
translation: On the day of the constellation Niu, Koxu, and Xuxu, the only three constellations whose wombbearers are unfit for work are Niu.

source_sentence: 其餘亢虛及女觜宿，此四宿日作事利益得於自在。
translation: The other constellations, Kauśāmbī and Mṛgāra, are days when it's beneficial to work on these four constellations to attain mastery.

source_sentence: 亢畢危等，此三宿日遠行安隱。
translation: On these three constellations, Kōbīyan and the others travel far and wide on their days to be at ease.

source_sentence: 氐宿、參宿、房宿、辟宿，此四宿日作種種事得人氣力，又宜娶婦要結親友及善知識。
translation: On the days of these four constellations, Śāriputra, Śanaiścara, Śubha, and Pārśva, they perform various deeds to gain human strength, and it's advisable to marry a woman and make close friends and good associates.

source_sentence: 箕宿、七星、婁宿、斗宿、張宿、胃宿，此六宿日有造作者如上利益。
translation: On the days of the constellations Śī, Śrāvastī, Lou, Dou, Zhang, and Gastric, these six constellations produce the above benefits.

source_sentence: 「『角宿十三日用事，為惡速疾。
translation: "'The thirteenth day of the constellation Horn will be used for evil and rapid illness.

source_sentence: 其日病者去菉豆皮生擣祭神六日除愈，其日生人嘲戲音樂歌舞作倡，皆悉能解，復能捨施。
translation: On that day, a sick person removes the rhododendron and makes a pestle offering to the gods for six days, and on that day, people ridicule, play, sing, dance, and raise music, all of which they are able to understand, and they're also able to dispense.

source_sentence: 又多色欲，亦復愛樂有知之人，其人入胎宜畢宿日。
translation: Also, he has many sexual desires and also enjoys people with knowledge, so it's appropriate for him to enter the womb on Pisut day.

source_sentence: 婁宿、七星箕宿等日，其人入胎多造作惡事。
translation: On days like Lushui and the seven stars of Minasu, that person often does bad deeds when entering the womb.

source_sentence: 辟宿、房宿、鬼宿等日，其人作事種種皆吉無有障礙。
translation: On days like Sukhāvatī, Hōshū, and Ghost, a person's activities are fortunate and unobstructed.

source_sentence: 危宿、氐宿、參宿等日，若作事業亦得自在。
translation: On days like Kuśinagara, Kuśinagara, and Samsara, he'll be able to do his work with ease.

source_sentence: 觜宿、亢宿、虛宿、尾宿，此四宿日遠行安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Nui, Kau, Xuxu, and Vai, these four constellations travel far and wide in comfort.

source_sentence: 觜宿、柳宿，營事業者得知識力。
translation: On the days of the constellations Nui and Liu, those who are engaged in business learn the power of consciousness.

source_sentence: 心宿、奎宿、斗宿、昴宿、翼宿、牛宿、張宿，此七宿日宜結親友婚姻等事。
translation: On the days of the constellations Heart, Kui, Dou, Pleiades, Ts'ui, Niu, and Zhang, it's appropriate to make friends and wives.

source_sentence: 「『亢宿十四日用事，能於世間作諸惡業，其性疾速為業快利，其日得病極惡難治，華蜜祭神，二十五日乃可得愈。
translation: "'The fourteenth day of the hyper constellation is for business, which creates bad karma in the world; its nature is fast and its actions are quick; it's extremely difficult to treat an illness that arises on that day, but it takes a lot of honey to sacrifice to the gods, and it's possible to heal on the 25th day.

source_sentence: 其日生者善能算計大富饒財，其性慳貪不能喜捨，又多瞋恚心意難得。
translation: Those born on that day are good at calculating great wealth and possessions, are stingy and greedy, can't be happy with charity, and have anger in their minds that's difficult to attain.

source_sentence: 若見特牛及黃腰者，須自防護。
translation: If he sees a special bull or a yellow-waisted one, he must guard himself.

source_sentence: 其人若在觜宿、箕宿此二宿日而入胎者，為惡不善。
translation: If a person enters the womb on the day of the constellations Kui and Ki, that person will be unwholesome.

source_sentence: 張宿、胃宿、柳宿、心宿，此四宿日欲作事者無有善惡。
translation: On the days of the constellations Zhang, Stomach, Willow, and Heart, there's nothing good or bad about those four constellations when they want to do something.

source_sentence: 室宿、尾宿、井宿等日，欲為事者多有障礙。
translation: On the days of the constellations Sukhāvatī, Vaiśravaṇa, and Jīvaka, there are many obstacles for those who want to do good deeds.

source_sentence: 參氐危宿，此三宿日有所營者得他人力。
translation: Referring to the constellation of Kuśinagara, these three constellations will give rise to other people's strengths if they have an occupation on their days.

source_sentence: 婁宿、箕宿、七星之宿，此三宿日遠行安隱。
translation: Ruxu, Xixu, and the seven constellations, these three constellations travel far and wide on their days to be at ease.

source_sentence: 房鬼、辟宿，此三宿日宜結親友娶婦之事。
translation: On the days of the Constellation of the Room and the Constellation of the Vulture, these three constellations are good for making friends and marrying.

source_sentence: 軫宿、女宿、畢宿、昴宿、牛宿、翼宿、亢宿，此七宿日，但宜行來餘不可作。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Aṣāḍhā, Nārāyaṇa, Pīrṇa, Pleiades, Ox, Pīrṇa, and Kau, these seven constellations are appropriate for travel but not for the rest.

source_sentence: 「『氐宿十五日用事，能作諸惡人所畏敬，其日得病以華祭神，滿十五日乃得除愈。
translation: "The fifteenth day of the constellation Śākyamuni's life is an event that causes evil people to fear it, and on that day he gets sick and offers flowers to the gods; he'll be cured after the fifteenth day is up.

source_sentence: 其日生者威德肅然大富饒財，其性慳貪婬他婦女，須自治身勿行此事。
translation: The person born on that day has dignified virtue and great wealth, but his or her nature is stingy and lustful toward other women; they must behave themselves and not do this.

source_sentence: 其人入胎宜在參宿，欲作諸事宜在危宿。
translation: It's appropriate for that person to enter the womb in the conjunction constellation and to perform various tasks in the crisis constellation.

source_sentence: 若七星宿、婁宿、箕宿日，作事者成無有善惡。
translation: If there are seven constellations on the day of the star, the night of the Lou, or the day of the Ki, those who perform deeds will become neither good nor bad.

source_sentence: 若昴宿日、牛宿、翼宿，營事則惡多有障礙。
translation: If it's the day of the Pleiades, the Ox, or the Wing, their work will be bad and have many obstacles.

source_sentence: 辟宿、房宿、尾宿，此三日則有利益。
translation: On the day of the Pleiades, Niu, and Yixu, their work is bad and has many obstacles.

source_sentence: 室宿之日遠行安隱。
translation: The day of the Constellation of the Room constellation is spent traveling far and wide in comfort.

source_sentence: 心奎柳宿，此三宿日欲為事者得他人力。
translation: On the day of the Heart constellation, the Mind constellation and the Willow constellation, those who want to work on these three constellations will gain strength from others.

source_sentence: 張宿、斗宿、胃宿，此三宿日宜結親友娶婦之事。
translation: On the days of the constellations Zhang, Dou, and Gast, it's appropriate to make friends and wives.

source_sentence: 「『房宿白月一日用事，能於世間作速疾事，其日病者作青豆飯以用祭神十日除愈，其日生者有墮崖岸刀兵之厄，於此二事須自護身，宜於治生販賣之業，軟弱儒雅樂法信福。
translation: "The day of the White Moon in the Constellation of Room is a day of service that's capable of causing rapid illness in the world; on that day, a sick person makes green beans and rice to offer to the gods for a ten-day cure; on that day, a person born on that day has the danger of falling over a cliff or into battle; in these two situations, he must protect himself; it's better to treat the business of growing and selling; and he's weak, refined, happy, and faithful to the merits of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 其人入胎，宜井宿日。
translation: It's better for him to enter the womb on the day of the well.

source_sentence: 張宿、斗宿胃、宿等日，欲作諸事無有善惡。
translation: On the days of the constellation of Zhang and the constellation of Di, the stomach and other constellations, he'll want to do various tasks that are neither good nor bad.

source_sentence: 軫畢、女宿，此三宿日作事者凶。
translation: On the days of Aśvajit and Navasu, those three constellations are bad for those who want to do deeds.

source_sentence: 心宿、柳宿、奎宿，此三宿日作事者吉。
translation: The days of the Heart constellation, the Willow constellation, and the Kui constellation are auspicious for those who work on these three constellations.

source_sentence: 室宿、房宿、鬼宿、辟宿，此四日作事安隱而得自在。
translation: These four constellations, namely, the constellation of Vṛji, Vṛji, Vṛji, and Vṛji, are used for peaceful deeds and attain freedom.

source_sentence: 箕宿、婁宿，此二日遠行安隱得知識力。
translation: For these two days, he travels far and wide, and he learns about the power of consciousness.

source_sentence: 虛宿、昴宿、張宿、翼宿，作事有利得他人物。
translation: The constellations Xu, Pleiades, Zhang, and Yixing work to gain possessions and other characters.

source_sentence: 箕宿、觜宿、角宿、虛宿、亢宿、參宿，此六宿日要結親友大小知識娶婦皆吉。
translation: On these six constellations, he'll make friends and relatives, and large and small associates will find it fortunate to marry.

source_sentence: 「『心宿二日用事，好作惡事，其日得病以粳米飯并大麥飯、黃石蜜等祭帝釋天，經十三日然後除愈。
translation: "'On the second day of the month, the Constellation of Heart is busy and does evil deeds; on that day, he gets sick and sacrifices millet rice, barley rice, and yellowstone honey to Indra, and then he's cured after 13 days.

source_sentence: 其日生者性多瞋恚無有慈心，縱持戒者亦復破戒。
translation: Those born on that day are angrier by nature and lack compassion, and even those who uphold precepts will again break them.

source_sentence: 若見於他行淨行法，宜於此處須自慎儆，生產之所亦須護身，此心宿日入胎者吉。
translation: If you see others practicing pure practices, you should exercise caution here, and you should protect yourself at the place of birth.

source_sentence: 角虛觜宿，此三宿日入胎不吉。
translation: The horns, the sky, and the constellation Kauśāmbī are inauspicious for entering the womb on this third constellation day.

source_sentence: 昴牛翼宿，此三宿日宜作諸事。
translation: On the day of the Pleiades, the Ox, and the Wing constellations, it's appropriate to perform various tasks on these three constellations.

source_sentence: 辟宿之日，若作事者多有障礙。
translation: On the day of the night watches, there are many obstacles if someone performs tasks.

source_sentence: 七星箕婁，此三宿日乃得自在多有利益。
translation: On the day of the seven constellations Ulū, these three constellations attain freedom and have much benefit.

source_sentence: 尾宿、柳宿、奎宿、危宿、軫宿、畢宿，此六星宿得他人力。
translation: These six constellations, namely, Vaiśravaṇa, Liuśravaṇa, Kuiśravaṇa, Jazuśravaṇa, Hejira, and Pīrvaṇa, attain other human strength.

source_sentence: 胃張斗宿，此三宿日宜遠行來道路安隱。
translation: On the day the star Stomach opens, the constellation Dipper, these three constellations are suitable for traveling far and coming on roads that are peaceful.

source_sentence: 室宿、亢宿、危宿、井宿、氐宿、參宿，此六宿日宜結親友及以娶婦。
translation: On the days of the constellations Sukhāvatī, Kauśāmbī, Jāṅgul, Jīvatī, and Samantan, it's appropriate to make friends and marry on these six constellations.

source_sentence: 「『尾宿三日用事，剛柔二事皆悉能作，其日得病取諸果根及果華氣，以用祭神三十日愈。
translation: "On the third day of the evening constellation, he'll perform tasks that are both rigid and flexible, and on that day he'll get sick and take the fruit-root and fruit-flower energy and use it to offer sacrifices to the gods for 30 days to heal.

source_sentence: 其日生者大富饒財多有穀麥，其人有相神德之人，唯生產處須自防慎，亦復好為草馬所蹋，至草馬所又須自備。
translation: The person born on that day will be wealthy and abundant in grain and barley, and he'll have the charisma of a man of virtue who must guard himself at the place of birth and is also likely to be spoiled by straw horses, and he'll need to prepare himself at the straw horse shelter.

source_sentence: 尾宿之日而入胎者，柳宿、角宿、危宿、參宿，此四宿日宜作惡事。
translation: Those who enter the womb on the day of the tail constellation, the willow constellation, the horn constellation, the critical constellation, and the cessation constellation, are the four constellations on which it's advisable to do bad deeds.

source_sentence: 軫宿、房宿、畢宿、奎宿，此四宿日不可造作諸種事業。
translation: On the days of Aṣāḍhā, Aṣāḍhā, Aṣāpī, and Aṣākus, these four constellations are not appropriate for various deeds.

source_sentence: 危宿之日，惡事得作。
translation: On the day of the Perilous Constellation, bad deeds may be done.

source_sentence: 斗宿、翼宿、胃宿，此三宿日欲作惡事，無有利益多諸煩惱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Diu, Yixing, and Gastrus, it's desirable to do bad deeds, which will bring no benefit and many afflictions.

source_sentence: 箕宿、七宿、婁宿，此三宿日乃得自在為有利益。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Si, Qi, and Lou, these three constellations attain freedom and are beneficial.

source_sentence: 角宿、虛宿、觜宿，此三宿日得他人力而獲自在。
translation: On the days of Jupiter, Xuxu, and Lu, these three constellations attain mastery over others.

source_sentence: 昴宿、牛宿、張宿，此三宿日行來安隱。
translation: Pleiades, Ox, and Zhang, these three constellations travel on their days to become comfortable.

source_sentence: 室宿、辟宿、井宿、鬼宿、房宿、氐宿，此六宿日宜結知識，大小親友婚姻嫁娶其事皆吉。
translation: On the days of Śrī, Vakṣu, Jīvaka, Ghost, Fang, and Dīrghā, these six constellations are good for making friends, and the marriages of large and small relatives and friends are auspicious.

source_sentence: 「『箕宿四日用事，其日得病應以麻糜尼俱陀子，祭於水神八月(丹本云日)乃愈。
translation: "'On the fourth day of the night in Kuśinagara, a person who gets sick on that day should sacrifice hemp, rice, and naked fish to the goddess of water in August (a day originally mentioned in the Tan edition) to be healed.

source_sentence: 其日生人善能耕田行船之業，其性精進行十善業，多聞智慧有大名譽大富饒財，常與智人共相隨逐。
translation: A person born on that day is skilled at plowing fields and walking boats, is diligent in performing the ten good actions, is well-versed in wisdom, has a great reputation and great wealth, and always follows wise people around.

source_sentence: 七星宿日及婁宿日，宜作諸業。
translation: On the day of the seven constellations and the day of the Loh constellation, it's appropriate to perform various tasks.

source_sentence: 角觜虛宿，此三宿日，造作諸事無善無惡。
translation: On the days of the constellations Horns and Hose, these three constellations create works that are neither good nor bad.

source_sentence: 氐宿、室宿，此二宿日為事不吉。
translation: On the days of the constellations Dīpa and Śubhū, these two constellations are inauspicious for business.

source_sentence: 井宿之日，經營事者失於舊業。
translation: On the day of the star of the well, those who are engaged in business lose their old occupations.

source_sentence: 翼宿、昴宿、牛宿等日欲為事者，自在如意能有利益。
translation: On the days of the constellations Pisces, Pleiades, and Ox, those who want to do business will be able to do so freely and effortlessly, and they'll be able to reap benefits.

source_sentence: 張宿、胃宿、斗宿等日造作事者，得他人力亦為有利。
translation: Those who work on the days of the constellations Zhang, Gastrus, and Di will also benefit from the strength of others.

source_sentence: 參宿、亢宿、危宿等日，欲作事者亦得他力。
translation: Those who want to do an act on the days of the constellations of Aṅgāla, Kauśāmbī, and Ajitavatī will also obtain the strength of others.

source_sentence: 軫宿、畢宿、女宿等日，若欲遠行道路安隱。
translation: On the days of Aṣāḍhā, Pīrṣa, and Nīrṣa, a person who wants to travel far will find peace on the road.

source_sentence: 奎宿、鬼宿、柳宿、房宿、辟宿，此五宿日宜結親友娶婦之事。
translation: On the days of Kui, Ghost, Willow, Fang, and Pai, it's appropriate to make friends and marry on these five constellations.

source_sentence: 「『斗宿五日用事，作柔軟業。
translation: "'The fifth day of the Dipper constellation is for making work and doing soft and tender tasks.

source_sentence: 其日得病炒粳穀華以蜜和之，用祭諸神七日除愈。
translation: On that day, they stir-fry millet and grain, mix it with honey, and use it as an offering to the gods for seven days to heal.

source_sentence: 其日生者是智慧人，少病大富多有知識，其人入胎宜在張宿。
translation: A person born on that day is a wise person who's rarely ill and is wealthy and knowledgeable, and it's appropriate for that person to enter the womb on a day like Chang's.

source_sentence: 若在危參亢宿等日，平無善惡，欲營眾事皆悉成就。
translation: If he enters the womb on a day like the day of the Perilous Constellation or the High Constellation, he'll be equally free of good and evil, and all the things he wants to do will be accomplished.

source_sentence: 辟宿、房宿、鬼宿、胃宿，此四宿日作事不吉。
translation: The days of the nights of Suppose, Room, Ghost, and Stomach are inauspicious.

source_sentence: 畢女軫宿，此三宿日欲求自在多有障礙。
translation: On the day of Amitâbha's birthday, these three constellations are often an obstacle to pursuing independence.

source_sentence: 昴宿、牛宿、翼宿等日，欲營事者自在如意。
translation: On the days of the Pleiades, Niu, and Ts'ui, those who want to work will be able to do so as they wish.

source_sentence: 氐宿、井宿、室宿等日，亦宜作事有其福力。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Kuśinagara, Jīvaka, and Vṛji, it's also appropriate to work in a way that's beneficial.

source_sentence: 角宿、觜宿、虛宿等日，若遠行者道路安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Horn, Nui, and Xuxu, those who travel far will find their way to safety.

source_sentence: 奎宿、柳宿、房宿、婁宿、七星心宿，此六宿日宜結親友嫁聚之事。
translation: On the days of Kui, Liu, Fang, Lou, and the seven-starred Heart constellation, it's good for these six constellations to associate friends and relatives for marriage.

source_sentence: 「『牛宿六日用事，其日生者為性剛毅心無怖畏，猛健勝人能破國土，前無強敵大富饒財。
translation: "'On the sixth day of the Ox constellation, a person born on that day will be resolute and fearless at heart, fierce and resilient, capable of destroying lands, and without strong enemies in the past, very wealthy and prosperous.'

source_sentence: 若入胎者宜在翼宿，一切眾星不為障礙皆作善友。
translation: If he enters the womb, it's appropriate for him to be in the wing constellation, where all the stars won't be an obstruction and will make him a good friend.

source_sentence: 「『女宿七日用事，其日得病經十二月，石蜜及華祭於山神乃得除愈。
translation: "'When the female constellation is occupied for seven days, it takes twelve months for her to get sick, and she's cured by offering rock honey and flowers to the mountain gods.

source_sentence: 其日生者遠行遇伴，宜以治生作柔軟事，其人有智少於病疾，常得世間國王供養。
translation: When a person born on that day travels far and meets a companion, it's advisable to perform tender acts to heal life; that person has wisdom and is seldom sick and ill, and they're always supported by worldly kings.

source_sentence: 軫宿之日入胎者，平無有善惡。
translation: A person who enters the womb on the day of the inconceivable constellation will be equally free of good and evil.

source_sentence: 鬼宿、房宿，此二宿日為作障礙。
translation: The constellations Ghost and Room are obstructive on their days.

source_sentence: 七星宿、心宿、女宿、畢宿，此四宿日宜造眾事。
translation: On the days of the seven constellations, the constellation of Heart, the constellation of Maiden, and the constellation of Phi, these four constellations are appropriate for creating various undertakings.

source_sentence: 亢宿、危宿、參宿等日，作事不合。
translation: The days of the constellations Kauśāmbī, Jāmbī, and Samantan are not appropriate for deeds.

source_sentence: 虛宿、觜宿，乃得和合如意自在。
translation: On the days of the constellations Śubhū and Kāśyapa, they'll be able to harmonize as they wish.

source_sentence: 室宿、井宿、氐宿等日，遠行安隱亦得自在。
translation: On the days of the constellations Sukhāvatī, Jīvatī, and Śiva, they'll also attain mastery over distant travel and tranquility.

source_sentence: 奎宿、房宿、柳宿等日欲營事者，得他人力亦遇良友。
translation: On the days of Kui, Fang, and Liu, those who want to work will find good friends in other people's strength.

source_sentence: 昴宿、張宿、翼宿等日，宜結親友。
translation: On the days of the Pleiades, Zhang, and Yixing, it's appropriate to make close friends.

source_sentence: 「『虛宿八日用事，其日得病一年乃愈，應以菉豆、烏豆、小豆、江豆作四種臛，香華祭神。
translation: "'On the eighth day of the Xuxu constellation, a person who gets sick on that day and recovers in a year should make four kinds of dessert with rhododendrons, black soybeans, lentils, and river beans, and offer incense and flowers to the gods.

source_sentence: 其日生者性多瞋貪貧無衣食，於色欲間亦復乏少，依約親屬常多怖畏。
translation: Those born on that day are angrier and greedy, poor in clothing and food, and lacking in the realm of form and desire, and they're always relying on their relatives to be fearful.

source_sentence: 若角宿日受胎者，吉。
translation: If a person is born on the day of the horns, it's auspicious.

source_sentence: 張宿、胃宿、箕宿之日，受胎者惡多有障礙。
translation: On the day of the constellation of Zhang, Stomach, and Key, the person who's conceived will be ill and often have obstacles.

source_sentence: 房宿、柳宿、奎宿等日，入胎者平無有善惡。
translation: On the day of the constellation of the room, the constellation of the willow, and the constellation of the kyu, the person who enters the womb will be fair and free of good and evil.

source_sentence: 氐宿、井宿、室宿等日，受胎亦惡離散不合。
translation: On the days of the constellations Śākyamuni, Jīvaka, and Śubhakura, the recipient of the pregnancy is also ill and distantly disjointed.

source_sentence: 亢危參宿，此三宿日作事利益得有和合。
translation: On the day of the constellation of Kauśāmbī, these three constellations work together for the benefit of others.

source_sentence: 觜宿之日，欲作事者一切得作。
translation: On the day of the constellation Nui, those who want to do work will be able to do it all.

source_sentence: 鬼宿、尾宿、辟宿，此三日宜以遠行道路安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Ghost, Vaiśra, and Vipaśyin, it's appropriate to travel far and wide on these three days for peace and quiet.

source_sentence: 婁宿、七星心宿等日，若為事者得善知識及於良伴。
translation: On the days of Loh and the seven constellations of Loh, those who perform deeds will gain good friends and good companions.

source_sentence: 翼宿、箕宿、昴宿等日，亦宜要結諸親友等。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Aśvakarṇa, Śiva, and Pleiades, it's also appropriate to associate with friends and relatives.

source_sentence: 畢宿、牛宿，此二宿日亦復宜於結大善友。
translation: It's also appropriate on the days of the constellations of Pisces and Niu to make great good friends.

source_sentence: 「『危宿九日用事，其性柔軟，其日得病蘇乳酪糜以祭水神七日除愈。
translation: "'The nine day of the constellation Peril is a day of service, and its nature is gentle; when it gets sick, it's best to offer milk and cheese to the god of water for seven days to heal it.

source_sentence: 其日生者性多瞋忿，猛健勇銳而有水厄，若至水所須自防慎。
translation: A person born on that day has a lot of anger and is strong and courageous, but he's troubled by water; he should take precautions if he goes to a place of water.

source_sentence: 亢宿之日入胎者，吉。
translation: It's good for a person to enter the womb on the day of the constellation Kōshū.

source_sentence: 婁宿、七星心宿等日，若作事者平無善惡。
translation: On days like Lusuk and the seven-star constellation Shinshu, those who do work will be equally free of good and evil.

source_sentence: 斗宿、昴宿、翼宿，此三宿日作事者惡。
translation: The days of Diux, Pleiades, and Yixing are bad for those who work on these three constellations.

source_sentence: 辟宿、鬼宿、尾宿、參宿，此四宿日作事亦惡不得如意。
translation: These four constellations, namely, Vakṣu, Ghost, Vaiśravaṇa, and Samantan, are also bad for deeds that don't go as intended on their days.

source_sentence: 室宿、井宿、氐宿之日，作事和合而得安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Sukhāvatī, Vaiśravaṇa, and Śiva, their deeds are combined, and they attain peace.

source_sentence: 七星之宿、房宿、柳宿、奎宿等日，遠行安吉。
translation: On the days of the seven constellations, the constellation of Hōshū, Yū, and Kui, their travels are peaceful and auspicious.

source_sentence: 張宿、箕宿、胃宿等日，欲作事者得良伴力。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Zhang, Xi, and Xi, those who want to work will have good companions.

source_sentence: 角宿、女宿、觜宿、軫宿、畢宿、牛宿，此六宿日宜結善友及以納妻。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Horns, Maiden, Naira, Neck, Pisgah, and Ox, it's good to make good friends and take a wife.

source_sentence: 「『室宿十日用事其性速疾，其日得病以種種華用祭於神三十日愈。
translation: "'On the tenth day of the night constellation, his nature is quick and fast, and when he gets sick on that day, he offers a sacrifice of various flowers to the gods for 30 days to heal.

source_sentence: 其日生者姦偽作賊，愚癡妄語殺害眾生，心常作惡不畏父母，若鬪諍盜賊如是等處橫羅其殃，其人入胎必在氐宿。
translation: On that day, a person born on that day will be an adulterer, a thief, a fool who speaks falsely and kills sentient beings, a person whose mind is always hostile and doesn't fear parents, and a person who fights, steals, and steals in such places will be ridiculed, and he'll surely be born on the night watches.

source_sentence: 若作事者，箕宿、胃宿、張宿之日，無有障礙處處可為。
translation: If someone works, on the day of the constellations of Ki, Stomach, and Zhang, there's no obstruction, and there's always room for them.

source_sentence: 畢宿、軫宿、牛宿，此三宿日若作事業一切皆惡。
translation: If he works on the days of the constellations Pi, He, and Niu, all his deeds will be bad.

source_sentence: 井宿之日，作事乃吉。
translation: On the day of the Well constellation, it's good to do business.

source_sentence: 房宿、柳宿、奎宿之日造作事者，多有障礙不得利益。
translation: Those who work on the days of the constellations Fang, Liu, and Kui will often have obstacles that prevent them from reaping benefits.

source_sentence: 鬼宿、尾宿、辟宿之日，宜作事業為得利益。
translation: On the days of the Ghost, Tail, and Possession constellations, it's appropriate to do work to get benefit.

source_sentence: 婁宿、七星心宿等日，遠行安隱。
translation: On the days of Lusuk and the seven constellations of Luxuriant, it's safe to travel far.

source_sentence: 昴宿、斗宿、箕宿等日，若作事者得良伴力。
translation: On the days of the Pleiades, Dipper, and Skua, those who work will have good companions.

source_sentence: 虛宿、觜宿、角宿等日，宜以要結小知識者。
translation: On days like Śubhū, Kāśyapa, and Jīvaka, it's appropriate to associate with a junior practitioner.

source_sentence: 虛宿、參亢宿等日，宜以要結大知識者。
translation: On days like Xuxu and Senqiu, it's appropriate to make important connections with someone who has great knowledge.

source_sentence: 「『辟宿十一日用事，其日得病華及鹿脯以祭火神滿七日愈。
translation: "'When the Vipaśyin uses the 11th day of the constellation for business, the sickness on that day is healed by offering flowers and deer preserves to the fire deity for seven full days.

source_sentence: 其日生者其人智慧樂聖人法，學於眾藝種種皆能，歌舞伎倡亦復悉解，又主大富多有金銀及饒穀帛，若入胎者宜尾宿日。
translation: A person born on that day is wise, enjoys the teachings of sages, is skilled in all kinds of arts, and fully understands all kinds of singing, dancing, and musical performances.

source_sentence: 昴宿、斗宿，此三宿日造作眾事平無善惡。
translation: On the Pleiades and Dipper constellations, these three constellations perform numerous deeds on their days, and there's nothing good or bad about them.

source_sentence: 觜女鬼宿，此三宿日為事成就。
translation: The Pleiades and Dipper, these three constellations perform deeds without good or evil on their days.

source_sentence: 心婁七星，此三宿日為事多障。
translation: On the days of the seven stars of the heart, these three constellations are for deeds and many obstacles.

source_sentence: 柳宿、房宿，此二宿日欲作事者和合如意。
translation: On the days of the constellations Willow and Fang, those who want to perform deeds harmonize as they wish.

source_sentence: 軫宿、牛宿、畢宿之日，作事自如逢遇良伴。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Aṣāḍhā, Niu, and Pi, they work as if they had met a good companion.

source_sentence: 張宿、胃宿、箕宿之日，行來安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Zhang, Zhi, and Xi, their actions come in peace.

source_sentence: 亢宿、虛宿、參宿，宜可要結小知識者。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Kau, Xuxu, and Sen, it's advisable to associate with junior associates.

source_sentence: 井宿、氐宿、危宿等日，宜可要結親友大吉。
translation: On the days of the constellations Jing, Xi, and Jixu, it's good to meet friends and relatives.

source_sentence: 「『奎宿十二日用事，其日得病宜以香華祭於神祇，經二十日乃得除愈。
translation: "'On the twelfth day of the month of Kui, it's advisable to offer incense and flowers to the spirits when sickness strikes on that day, and it takes 20 days to heal.

source_sentence: 其日生者作柔軟事有大勢力，人所尊重，唯於闇裏須自護身，大富饒財金銀穀帛無有限量，治生有利得他人物。
translation: A person born on that day will have great strength in performing gentle deeds and will be respected by people, except in the dark, where they must guard themselves; their wealth and possessions will be unlimited, and they'll be able to treat birth and gain other people.

source_sentence: 彼人入胎宜在心宿、軫宿、畢宿、牛宿等日，亦多蓄積。
translation: It's appropriate for that person to enter the womb on the days of the heart, neck, pearls, and cattle constellations, and to accumulate much.

source_sentence: 亢宿、虛宿，此二宿日，作事者平無有善惡。
translation: On the days of the constellations Kauśāmbī and Xuxu, those two constellations are equally productive, with nothing good or bad to do.

source_sentence: 參宿之日，不可作事。
translation: On the days of the participating constellations, they're not allowed to do work.

source_sentence: 柳宿、翼宿、斗宿、昴宿，此四宿日行來安隱。
translation: On the days of Willow, Wing, Dipper, and Pleiades, these four constellations travel peacefully.

source_sentence: 女宿、畢宿、角宿之日，若作事者為得良伴。
translation: On the days of the constellations Maiden, Pisces, and Horns, those who work will find good company.

source_sentence: 箕宿、張宿、胃宿等日欲作事者，無有障礙為得人力。
translation: On the days of the constellations Sku, Zhang, and Gastrus, those who want to work will attain strength without any obstruction.

source_sentence: 婁宿、心宿、尾宿，此三宿日欲結知識為有利益。
translation: On the days of Lusu, Xin, and Wei, these three constellations are beneficial when they want to form friends.

source_sentence: 井宿、氐宿、危宿，此三宿日宜可要結知識小者。
translation: On the days of the constellations of Jing, Dui, and Jue, these three constellations are appropriate for those who want to form small bonds of knowledge.

source_sentence: 鬼宿、尾宿、室宿，此三宿日宜可要結知識大者。
translation: On the day of the Ghost, Tail, and Room constellations, these three constellations are appropriate for the formation of knowledge that's large.

source_sentence: 「『婁宿十三日用事，其日得病，麥粥祭神二十五日然後除愈。
translation: "'On the 13th day of Roo's night, he'll get sick and offer wheat gruel to the gods for 25 days, then he'll be cured.

source_sentence: 其日生者為性躁疾，常護眾生不害物命，若至關津須自防慎，當作醫師善解方藥能療眾病，亦復善能歌舞之事。
translation: Those born on that day are restless and quick-tempered, always protect sentient beings and don't harm the lives of living things, and take precautions if they reach a barrier, acting as a physician who well understands prescriptions and medicines and can treat illnesses and is also skilled at singing and dancing.

source_sentence: 心宿之日有入胎者，無有障礙。
translation: Those who enter the womb on the day of the constellation of the heart have no obstructions.

source_sentence: 角宿、觜宿、女宿、虛宿、井宿、亢宿、危宿，此七宿日若作事者平無善惡。
translation: If someone works on the days of the constellations Horns, Mercury, Maiden, Vulture, Wells, Hyper, and Peril, these seven constellations are equally free of good and bad deeds.

source_sentence: 此星宿日，唯莫賣買，不宜行來及以剃頭，亦不得至相鬪處所。
translation: On these constellations' days, you mustn't sell or buy anything; you shouldn't travel or shave your head; and you mustn't go to places where people fight.

source_sentence: 昴宿、斗宿、張宿，此三宿日宜報怨仇鬪諍得勝，宜作輕利濡事得成。
translation: On the days of the Pleiades, Dipper, and Zhang, these three constellations are good for getting revenge and winning fights, and they're good for doing light tasks that will bring success.

source_sentence: 七星宿日作事牢固，亦有利益。
translation: On the days of the seven constellations, their actions are strong and beneficial.

source_sentence: 張宿、箕宿、胃宿，此三宿日欲遠行安隱。
translation: On the days of the constellations Zhang, Xi, and Guxu, these three constellations are good for traveling far and secluded.

source_sentence: 辟軫、畢宿，此三宿日作事利益亦宜密語。
translation: On the days of Aṣāḍhā and Pīrṣa, it's appropriate to speak confidentially about the benefits of these three constellations.

source_sentence: 參宿、虛宿、亢宿之日，宜作惡事。
translation: On the days of the constellations Samsuk, Xuxu, and Kau, it's appropriate to do bad deeds.

source_sentence: 鬼宿、尾宿、室宿等日，宜可要結諸小知識。
translation: On the days of the Ghost, Tail, and Room constellations, it's appropriate to associate with lesser friends.

source_sentence: 柳宿、房宿、辟宿等日，宜可要結諸大知識，為得眾人愛護於己，宜造床輿及買牛馬。
translation: On the days of the constellations Willow, Room, and Possession, it's appropriate to associate with great teachers, and to get people to love and protect you, it's appropriate to build a bed and mast and buy cattle and horses.

source_sentence: 「『胃宿十四日用事，人生吉凶造作善惡疾病等事如上說了。
translation: "The fourteen days of the stomach constellation are for affairs, and the fortune and misfortune of life, the creation of good and bad diseases, and other affairs are as explained above.

source_sentence: 月行虛空周匝宿訖還更起昴，是故言日。
translation: The moon travels through space, circles the constellations, and returns to the Pleiades when it finishes, which is why it's called a sun.

source_sentence: 虛空月滿三十晝夜，亦名月滿。
translation: When the moon fills 30 days and nights in space, it's also called the full moon.

source_sentence: 八月滿者起胃終昴，其月如是。
translation: When the eighth month is full, it rises from the stomach and ends at the Pleiades, and the moon does so.

source_sentence: 夜十五時晝十五時，日午之影長六脚跡。
translation: At fifteen hours of the night and fifteen hours of the day, the shadow of the sun at noon is six feet long.

source_sentence: 婁宿夜行、房在日前，熒惑日子是時隨日。
translation: When Lusu travels by night and lives in a house before the sun, this is the time when he experiences confusion, following the sun.

source_sentence: 是八月時蝎神主當，昴宿為業，前已說竟。
translation: It's the eighth month when the scorpion god is in charge and the Pleiades are in charge of their business, as I've explained before.

source_sentence: 是白月內，次十五日昴又用事，月合昴星是八月滿，昴與月合一日夜訖；其次復轉合於畢宿，九月初日畢用事也。
translation: During this white moon, the Pleiades are in active service on the following fifteenth day, and when the moon joins the Pleiades, the eighth month is full, and the Pleiades and moon unite for the end of the day and night; then they again merge with Pisces, and Pisces is in active service at the beginning of the ninth month.

source_sentence: 「『九月黑月，一日合畢、二日合觜、三日合參、四日合井、五日合鬼、六日合柳、七日合星、八日合張、九日合翼、十日合軫、十一日合角、十二日合亢、十三日合氐、十四日合房、十五日合心，是黑月滿。
translation: "When the ninth month is black, it combines with Pīr on the first day, with Kāśyapa on the second day, with Sen on the third day, with Jīng on the fourth day, with Ghost on the fifth day, with Ryu on the sixth day, with Xing on the seventh day, with Zhang on the eighth day, with Tsong on the ninth day, with Rājapū on the tenth day, with Kokō on the eleventh day, with Kośoka on the twelfth day, with Kṛṣṇa on the thirteenth day, with Fang on the fourteenth day, and with Xin on the fifteenth day, which is the full extent of the black month.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合尾、二日合箕、三日合斗、四日合牛、五日合女、六日合虛、七日合危、八日合室、九日合辟、十日合奎、十一日合婁、十二日合胃、十三日合昴、十四日合畢、十五日合觜是白月滿。
translation: "When the white moon is full, it combines the tail on the first day, the winnowing on the second day, the dipper on the third day, the ox on the fourth day, the cow on the fifth day, the hollow on the sixth day, the danger on the seventh day, the chamber on the eighth day, the opening on the ninth day, the kuai on the tenth day, the lou on the eleventh day, the stomach on the twelfth day, the Pleiades on the thirteenth day, the bi on the fourteenth day, and the khara on the fifteenth day, that's the full white moon.

source_sentence: 九月合觜宿滿，晝十四時、夜十六時，日午之影長八脚跡，日行南陸，昴宿夜行、尾在日前。
translation: In the ninth month, when the conjunction of the Pleiades is full, at fourteen hours of the day and sixteen hours of the night, the sun's noon shadow is eight feet long, the sun travels southward, and the Pleiades travel at night with their tails in front of them.

source_sentence: 其九月時歲星用事，為一切天之所尊敬，得失諸事皆悉由之。
translation: During the ninth month, the yearly stars work in ways that are honored by all the gods, and they are responsible for all the successes and failures of affairs.

source_sentence: 是九月時，射神主當。
translation: During this ninth month, the archery gods are in charge.

source_sentence: 「『十月黑月，一日合參、二日合井、三日合鬼、四日合柳、五日合星、六日合張、七日合翼、八日合軫、九日合角、十日合亢、十一日合氐、十二日合房、十三日合心、十四日合尾、十五日合箕，是黑月滿。
translation: "When the tenth month is black, the first day conjoins the centaur, the second day conjoins the well, the third day conjoins the ghost, the fourth day conjoins the willow, the fifth day conjoins the star, the sixth day conjoins the tensor, the seventh day conjoins the wing, the eighth day conjoins the afternoon, the ninth day conjoins the horns, the tenth day conjoins the hyperbolic, the eleventh day conjoins the triplet, the twelfth day conjoins the room, the thirteenth day conjoins the heart, the fourteenth day conjoins the tail, and the fifteenth day conjoins the wine-wheel, which is the full extent of the black moon.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合斗、二日合牛、三日合女虛、四日合危、五日合室、六日合辟、七日合奎、八日合婁、九日合胃、十日合昴、十一日合畢、十二日合觜、十三日合參、十四日合井、十五日合鬼，是白月滿。
translation: "When the white moon combines the dipper on the 1st, the ox on the 2nd, the female sphere on the 3rd, the grave on the 4th, the chamber on the 5th, the open on the 6th, the kuai on the 7th, the lou on the 8th, the stomach on the 9th, the Pleiades on the 10th, the pi on the 11th, the khara on the 12th, the cave on the 13th, the well on the 14th, and the ghost on the 15th, that's the full white moon.

source_sentence: 「『十月合鬼宿滿，晝十三時、夜十七時，日午之影長十脚跡，觜宿夜行、女在日前。
translation: "'When the tenth month is at conjunction with the full moon, the thirteenth hour of the day and the seventeenth hour of the night, the sun's noon shadow is ten feet long, and the nighttime movement of the constellation Kāśyapa is preceded by the female.

source_sentence: 當此之時辰星用事。
translation: At that time, the stars are in action.

source_sentence: 是十月時，摩竭之神主當其月。
translation: It's the tenth month when the god Māgan is in charge of that month.

source_sentence: 「『十一月黑月之內，一日合柳、二日合七星、三日合張、四日合翼、五日合軫、六日合角、七日合亢、八日合氐、九日合房、十日合心、十一日合尾、十二日合箕、十三日合斗、十四日合牛、十五日合女，是為黑月滿。
translation: "'In the eleventh month of the dark moon, the first day conjoins the willow, the second day conjoins the seven stars, the third day conjoins the tensor, the fourth day conjoins the wings, the fifth day conjoins the horns, the seventh day conjoins the hyperbola, the eighth day conjoins the triplets, the ninth day conjoins the room, the tenth day conjoins the heart, the eleventh day conjoins the tail, the twelfth day conjoins the winnowing star, the thirteenth day conjoins the dipper, the fourteenth day conjoins the ox, and the fifteenth day conjoins the woman; this is the full dark moon.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合虛、二日合危、三日合室、四日合辟、五日合奎、六日合婁、七日合胃、八日合昴、九日合畢、十日合觜、十一日合參、十二日合井、十三日合鬼、十四日合柳、十五日合七星，是白月滿。
translation: "'When the white moon combines with the void on the 1st, the peril on the 2nd, the privy on the 3rd, the puṣpa on the 4th, the kyu on the 5th, the lou on the 6th, the stomach on the 7th, the Pleiades on the 8th, the pi on the 9th, the chattering on the 10th, the censer on the 11th, the well on the 12th, the ghost on the 13th, the willow on the 14th, and the seven stars on the 15th, this is the full white moon.'

source_sentence: 「『十一月合七星滿，晝十二時、夜十八時，日午之影十二脚跡，鬼宿夜行、危在日前，近南轉，辰星用事。
translation: "'When the seven stars are conjoined in November, the twelfth hour of the day and the eighteenth hour of the night fall in, the sun's noon shadow has twelve footprints, the ghosts travel by night, the danger is near the front, and the stars are in use as they turn south.

source_sentence: 是十一月，水器之神主當其月。
translation: It's the eleventh month, and the god Śāriputra of the water vessel is in charge of it.

source_sentence: 「『十二月黑月，一日合張、二日合翼、三日合軫、四日合角、五日合亢、六日合氐、七日合房、八日合心、九日合尾、十日合箕、十一日合斗、十二日合牛、十三日合女、十四日合虛、十五日合危，是黑月滿。
translation: "When the twelfth month is black, the first day conjoins the palace, the second day conjoins the wings, the third day conjoins the nave, the fourth day conjoins the horns, the fifth day conjoins the hyperbola, the sixth day conjoins the triplet, the seventh day conjoins the room, the eighth day conjoins the heart, the ninth day conjoins the tail, the tenth day conjoins the winnowing star, the eleventh day conjoins the dipper, the twelfth day conjoins the ox, the thirteenth day conjoins the woman, the fourteenth day conjoins the void, and the fifteenth day conjoins the peril, which is the full black moon.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合室、二日合辟、三日合奎、四日合婁、五日合胃、六日合昴、七日合畢、八日合觜、九日合參、十日合井、十一日合鬼、十二日合柳、十三日合七星、十四日合張、十五日合翼，是白月滿。
translation: "'When the white moon combines the room on the first day, the open on the second day, the kyu on the third day, the lou on the fourth day, the stomach on the fifth day, the Pleiades on the sixth day, the pi on the seventh day, the chatter on the eighth day, the censer on the ninth day, the well on the tenth day, the ghost on the eleventh day, the willow on the twelfth day, the seven stars on the thirteenth day, the tapestry on the fourteenth day, and the wings on the fifteenth day, that's when the white moon is full.

source_sentence: 「『十二月合翼宿滿，晝行十三時、夜行十七時，日轉近北，日午之影十二脚跡，七星夜行天師歲星用事之時，是十二月，天魚之神主當其月。
translation: "'When the twelfth month is full, the thirteenth hour of daytime travel and the seventeenth hour of nighttime travel, the sun turns near the north, the shadow of the noon sun has twelve footprints, and the seven stars travel at night when the god Shishen's yearly star is in use, that's the twelfth month, and the god of the celestials and fish is in charge of that month.

source_sentence: 「『正月黑月，一日合軫、二日合角、三日合亢、四日合氐、五日合房、六日合心、七日合尾、八日合箕、九日合斗、十日合牛、十一日合女、十二日合虛、十三日合危、十四日合室、十五日合辟，是黑月滿。
translation: "'When the first month is black, the first day conjoins the afternoon, the second day conjoins the horns, the third day conjoins the hyperbola, the fourth day conjoins the śi, the fifth day conjoins the room, the sixth day conjoins the heart, the seventh day conjoins the tail, the eighth day conjoins the skull, the ninth day conjoins the dipper, the tenth day conjoins the ox, the eleventh day conjoins the maiden, the twelfth day conjoins the sky, the thirteenth day conjoins the perilous, the fourteenth day conjoins the room, and the fifteenth day conjoins the prying eyes, which is the full moon of blackness.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合奎、二日合婁、三日合胃、四日合昴、五日合畢、六日合觜、七日合參、八日合井、九日合鬼、十日合柳、十一日合七星、十二日合張、十三日合翼、十四日合軫、十五日合角，是白月滿。
translation: "'When the white moon combines Kui on the 1st, Lou on the 2nd, Stomach on the 3rd, Pleiades on the 4th, Pi on the 5th, Hap on the 6th, Sen on the 7th, Jai on the 8th, Ghost on the 9th, Willow on the 10th, the 7th star on the 11th, Zhang on the 12th, Ts'ui on the 13th, Anna on the 14th, and Cape on the 15th, this is the full white moon.'

source_sentence: 「『正月合角宿滿，晝行十四時、夜行十六時，日轉近北，日午之影長八脚跡，張宿夜行、婁在日前，日子熒惑嚴惡速疾此時用事，是正月時，持羊之神主當其月。
translation: "When the first month of the year is full, the horns close at 14 hours of daytime travel and 16 hours of nighttime travel, the sun turns near to the north, the shadow of the noon sun grows eight feet long, the open night travels until the sun rises, and the days are filled with confusion, seriousness, evil, and speed.

source_sentence: 「『二月黑月，一日合亢、二日合氐、三日合房、四日合心、五日合尾、六日合箕、七日合斗、八日合牛、九日合女、十日合虛、十一日合危、十二日合室、十三日合辟、十四日合奎、十五日合婁，是黑月滿。
translation: "When the second month is black, the first day combines with the hyperbola, the second day combines with the triplet, the third day combines with the abbot, the fourth day combines with the heart, the fifth day combines with the tail, the sixth day combines with the skull, the seventh day combines with the dipper, the eighth day combines with the ox, the ninth day combines with the woman, the tenth day combines with the void, the eleventh day combines with the perilous, the twelfth day combines with the abbot, the thirteenth day combines with the priests, the fourteenth day combines with the kyu, and the fifteenth day combines with the lou, which is the full black month.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合胃、二日合昴、三日合畢、四日合觜、五日合參、六日合井、七日合鬼、八日合柳、九日合星、十日合張、十一日合翼、十二日合軫、十三日合角、十四日合亢、十五日合氐，是白月滿。
translation: "'When the white moon combines the stomach on the 1st, the Pleiades on the 2nd, the Pleiades on the 3rd, the Kharaa on the 4th, the censer on the 5th, the well on the 6th, the ghost on the 7th, the willow on the 8th, the star on the 9th, the tensor on the 10th, the wing on the 11th, the inconclusors on the 12th, the horns on the 13th, the hyperbola on the 14th, and the śramaṇa on the 15th, that's the full white moon.'

source_sentence: 「『二月合氐宿滿，晝行十五時、夜行十五時，日近北行，日午之影長六脚跡，角宿夜行、昴在日前，阿修羅師名曰太白此時用事，是二月時，持牛之神主當其月。
translation: "'When the second month is full, the constellations merge at fifteen hours during the day and fifteen hours during the night, the sun travels near the north, the shadow of the sun at noon is six feet long, the horns travel at night, and the Pleiades are in front of the sun, and the master of the asuras is called Taibai, who is in charge of the affairs of the second month.

source_sentence: 「『三月黑月，一日合房、二日合心、三日合尾、四日合箕、五日合斗、六日合牛、七日合女、八日合虛、九日合危、十日合室、十一日合辟、十二日合奎、十三日合婁、十四日合胃、十五日合昴，是黑月滿。
translation: "'In the third month of the month of darkness, the first day combines the room, the second day combines the heart, the third day combines the tail, the fourth day combines the winnowing, the fifth day combines the dipper, the sixth day combines the ox, the seventh day combines the woman, the eighth day combines the sky, the ninth day combines the peril, the tenth day combines the room, the eleventh day combines the opening, the twelfth day combines the kyu, the thirteenth day combines the lou, the fourteenth day combines the stomach, and the fifteenth day combines the Pleiades; this is the full moon of darkness.'

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合畢、二日合觜、三日合參、四日合井、五日合鬼、六日合柳、七日合星、八日合張、九日合翼、十日合軫、十一日合角、十二日合亢、十三日合氐、十四日合房、十五日合心，是白月滿。
translation: "When the white moon is full, the 1st day combines with Pi, the 2nd day combines with Khara, the 3rd day combines with Sen, the 4th day combines with Jing, the 5th day combines with Ghost, the 6th day combines with Liu, the 7th day combines with Xing, the 8th day combines with Zhang, the 9th day combines with Tsubo, the 10th day combines with Heung, the 11th day combines with Horn, the 12th day combines with Ko, the 13th day combines with Ku, the 14th day combines with Hō, and the 15th day combines with Shin, which is the full white moon.

source_sentence: 「『三月合心宿滿，晝行十六時、夜行十四時，日行近北，日午之影長四脚跡，氐宿夜行、觜在日前，日子名曰佛陀懸多此時用事作柔軟業，是三月時，雙鳥之神主當其月。
translation: "When the conjunction of the mind and constellations is full in March, the daytime travel time is 16 hours, the nighttime travel time is 14 hours, the sun travels near the north, the shadow of the noon sun is four feet long, the nighttime travel time of the constellations is on the west side, and the day is called Buddhahantra.

source_sentence: 「『四月黑月，一日合尾、二日合箕、三日合斗、四日合牛、五日合女、六日合虛、七日合危、八日合室、九日合辟、十日合奎、十一日合婁、十二日合胃、十三日合昴、十四日合畢、十五日合觜，是黑月滿。
translation: "When the fourth month is black, the first day combines with the tail, the second day combines with the winnowing, the third day combines with the dipper, the fourth day combines with the ox, the fifth day combines with the women, the sixth day combines with the sky, the seventh day combines with the danger, the eighth day combines with the room, the ninth day combines with the puṣpa, the tenth day combines with the kyu, the eleventh day combines with the lou, the twelfth day combines with the stomach, the thirteenth day combines with the Pleiades, the fourteenth day combines with the piṭaka, and the fifteenth day combines with the chattering, which is the full black month.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合參、二日合井、三日合鬼、四日合柳、五日合七星、六日合張、七日合翼、八日合軫、九日合角、十日合亢十、一日合氐、十二日合房、十三日合心、十四日合尾、十五日合箕，是白月滿。
translation: "When the white moon combines with the censer on the 1st, the well on the 2nd, the ghost on the 3rd, the willow on the 4th, the seven stars on the 5th, the tensor on the 6th, the wings on the 7th, the wing on the 8th, the horns on the 9th, the hyperbola on the 10th, the dharma on the 1st, the room on the 12th, the heart on the 13th, the tail on the 14th, and the winnowing on the 15th, that's the full white moon.

source_sentence: 「『四月合箕宿滿，晝行十七時、夜行十三時，日近北行，日午之影長兩脚跡，房宿夜行、日隨井星，是四月時，蟹神主當其月。
translation: "'When the fourth month is full at conjunction with the star Minis, the sun travels near the north at 17 hours of daytime and 13 hours of nighttime, and the sun's noon shadow is two feet long; the house constellation travels at night, and the sun follows the star Inu, which is the fourth month, and the crab god is in charge of that month.'

source_sentence: 「『五月黑月，一日合斗、二日合牛女、三日合虛、四日合危、五日合室、六日合辟、七日合奎、八日合婁、九日合胃、十日合昴、十一日合畢、十二日合觜、十三日合參、十四日合井、十五日合鬼，是黑月滿。
translation: "When the fifth month is black, the first day conjoins the Dipper, the second day conjoins the Cowherdess, the third day conjoins the Hollow, the fourth day conjoins the Perilous, the fifth day conjoins the Chamber, the sixth day conjoins the Pioneer, the seventh day conjoins the Kui, the eighth day conjoins the Lou, the ninth day conjoins the Stomach, the tenth day conjoins the Pleiades, the eleventh day conjoins the Bi, the twelfth day conjoins the Kharaka, the thirteenth day conjoins the Sen, the fourteenth day conjoins the Well, and the fifteenth day conjoins the Ghost, which is the full moon of blackness.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合柳、二日合七星、三日合張、四日合翼、五日合軫、六日合角、七日合亢、八日合氐、九日合房、十日合心、十一日合尾、十二日合箕、十三日合斗、十四日合牛、十五日合女，是白月滿。
translation: "'When the white moon combines the willow on the 1st, the seven stars on the 2nd, the tensor on the 3rd, the wings on the 4th, the wing on the 5th, the horns on the 6th, the hyperbola on the 7th, the triumph on the 8th, the abode on the 9th, the heart on the 10th, the tail on the 11th, the winnowing on the 12th, the dipper on the 13th, the ox on the 14th, and the girl on the 15th, that's the full white moon.'

source_sentence: 「『五月合女宿滿，晝行十八時、夜行十二時，日極行北，日午之影長半脚跡，箕宿夜行、心在日前，是時日光焰熾大盛。
translation: "'When the constellation Maida is full in May, the sun travels at 18 hours during the day and 12 hours during the night, and its shadow at sunrise is half a foot long as it travels north, while the constellation Kisum travels at night and its heart is in front of it, at which time the sun's light blazes brightly.

source_sentence: 此五月時，師子之神主當其月。
translation: During this fifth month, the lion god is in charge of that month.

source_sentence: 「『六月黑月，一日合虛、二日合危、三日合室、四日合辟、五日合奎、六日合婁、七日合胃、八日合昴、九日合畢、十日合觜、十一日合參、十二日合井、十三日合鬼、十四日合柳、十五日合七星，是黑月滿。
translation: "When the sixth month is black, the first day combines with the sky, the second day combines with danger, the third day combines with the room, the fourth day combines with the open sky, the fifth day combines with the kyu, the sixth day combines with the lou, the seventh day combines with the stomach, the eighth day combines with the Pleiades, the ninth day combines with the pi, the tenth day combines with the chattering, the eleventh day combines with the censer, the twelfth day combines with the well, the thirteenth day combines with the ghost, the fourteenth day combines with the willow, and the fifteenth day combines with the seven stars; this is the full black moon.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合張、二日合翼、三日合軫、四日合角、五日合亢、六日合氐、七日合房、八日合心、九日合尾、十日合箕、十一日合斗、十二日合牛女、十三日合虛、十四日合危、十五日合室，是白月滿。
translation: "When the white moon is full, the 1st day combines with the palace, 2nd day combines with the wings, 3rd day combines with the inconceivable, 4th day combines with the horns, 5th day combines with the hyperbolic, 6th day combines with the triplets, 7th day combines with the room, 8th day combines with the heart, 9th day combines with the tail, 10th day combines with the winnowing, 11th day combines with the dipper, 12th day combines with the cowherd, 13th day combines with the sky, 14th day combines with the perilous, and 15th day combines with the room, which is the full white moon.

source_sentence: 「『六月合室宿滿，晝行十七時、夜行十三時，強日近南行，日午之影長二脚跡，女宿夜行、張在日前，月子名覺此時用事。
translation: "'When the sixth month is full, the moon travels 17 hours by day and 13 hours by night, the sun travels near the south, the shadow of the sun at noon is two feet long, the goddess travels at night, and the moon's name is recognized as being in use at this time.

source_sentence: 此六月時，天女之神主當其月。
translation: During this sixth month, the goddess of the gods is in charge of that month.

source_sentence: 「『七月黑月，一日合辟、二日合奎、三日合婁、四日合胃、五日合昴、六日合畢、七日合觜、八日合參、九日合井、十日合鬼、十一日合柳、十二日合七星、十三日合張、十四日合翼、十五日合軫，是黑月滿。
translation: "When the seventh month is black, the first day combines Prabhū, the second day combines Kui, the third day combines Loh, the fourth day combines Stomach, the fifth day combines Plei, the sixth day combines Pi, the seventh day combines Khara, the eighth day combines Sen, the ninth day combines Jing, the tenth day combines Ghost, the eleventh day combines Willow, the twelfth day combines Seven Stars, the thirteenth day combines Zhang, the fourteenth day combines Wings, and the fifteenth day combines Anāthapiṇḍada, which is the full extent of the black moon.

source_sentence: 「『白月，一日合角、二日合亢、三日合氐、四日合房、五日合心、六日合尾、七日合箕、八日合斗、九日合牛女、十日合虛、十一日合危、十二日合室、十三日合辟、十四日合奎、十五日合婁，是白月滿。
translation: "When the white moon combines with the horns on the 1st, the hyperbola on the 2nd, the triplet on the 3rd, the room on the 4th, the heart on the 5th, the tail on the 6th, the winnowing star on the 7th, the dipper on the 8th, the cowherd girl on the 9th, the hyacinth on the 10th, the danger on the 11th, the chamber on the 12th, the opening on the 13th, the kyu on the 14th, and the lou on the 15th, that's the full white moon.

source_sentence: 「『七月合婁宿滿，晝行十六時、夜行十四時，日轉近南，日午之影長四脚跡，室宿夜行、角在日前，阿修羅師名曰太白此時用事。
translation: "When the seventh month coincides with the full moon, the sun travels 16 hours by day and 14 hours by night, the sun turns near to the south, the shadow of the noon sun grows four feet long, the room travels by night, and the horns are before the sun, and the master of the asuras is called Taibai, who works at this time.

source_sentence: 是七月時，秤量之神主當其月。』
translation: It's the seventh month when the god Weighing is in charge of that month.'

source_sentence: 「爾時，佉盧虱吒告天眾言：『是諸月等各有主當，汝可救濟四種眾生。
translation: "At the time, Kashgar told the celestials, 'Each of these moons has a master in charge, so you can save four kinds of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 何者為四？
translation: What are the four?

source_sentence: 救地上人、諸龍、夜叉，乃至蝎等，如斯之類皆悉救之。
translation: They all save people on earth, dragons, yakṣas, even scorpions, and so forth.

source_sentence: 我以安樂諸眾生故，布置星宿各有分部，乃至摸呼羅時等亦皆具說，隨其國土方面之處，所作事業隨順增長。』
translation: For the welfare of sentient beings, I've arranged the stars and constellations in their respective divisions, and I've explained them all, even touching the time and so forth, and following the aspects of their lands, the works they do will increase accordingly.'

source_sentence: 「佉盧虱吒於大眾前合掌說言：『如是安置日月年時大小星宿。
